thread.title: FusionIQ Announces "IQ It!" Trader Platform Release 2.0 Featuring New Advanced Filters and Market-Weighted Composite Master Scores
thread.title_full: FusionIQ Announces "IQ It!" Trader Platform Release 2.0 Featuring New Advanced Filters and Market-Weighted Composite Master Scores - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: FusionIQ Announces "IQ It!" Trader Platform Release 2.0 Featuring New Advanced Filters and Market-Weighted Composite Master Scores
text:
New Features Further Enhance Premiere Web-Based Platform for Unbiased, Actionable Stock & ETF Data
Wellesley, MA (PRWEB) September 08, 2015
FusionIQ, a financial information and technology company with a proprietary algorithm for scoring stocks and ETF’s in four dimensions, today announced the release of version 2.0 of its flagship "IQ It!" Trader Platform.
Enhancements to the web-based platform include new advanced filters, which incorporate a wide of range of publicly available financial data into FusionIQ stock profiles that can be filtered and sorted together with FusionIQ proprietary metrics, and new holdings-weighted Composite Master Scores for ETF's and Sectors.
FusionIQ's unique Master Score methodology provides a true four-dimensional view of a company through an algorithm which processes a stock's fundamental, technical, sentiment, and momentum data into a numeric value between 1-100. The Composite Master Scores for Sectors and ETF's provide a true bottoms-up view of baskets of securities based on a roll-up of the individual Master Scores of the underlying securities. With version 2.0, the Composite Master Scores move from equal-weighted to now market-weighted, providing users with a real-time, four-dimensional, market cap or holdings-weighted assessment of an entire market sector, market index, or ETF that is unique in the financial data or artificial intelligence marketplace today.
"Since launching our next-generation web-based platform in June, FusionIQ has been empowering users with smart, objective, and actionable scores and signals that have been right on gold, right on China, and right on the broad August market decline", said Paul M. Simons, FusionIQ CEO. "Today's upgrade of our robust web-based platform is the first in a series of upcoming releases which will continually improve the delivery of our data to the financial and investment community".
About FusionIQ
FusionIQ, headquartered in Wellesley, MA, is a financial information and technology company with a proprietary algorithm for scoring stocks and ETF’s in four dimensions, empowering professional traders, registered investment advisors, institutions and family offices with smarter analytics for smarter investing.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/09/prweb12932942.htm
